content: my aunt asked me to knit her a scarf for christmas and knowing that i was getting a late start on things i chose a pattern that was quick and easy and that i love the feather and fan stitch dimensions shown 15 x 31 you can knit this pattern to your desired length personal note 8/25/2015 i m blown away by how many people have knit this pattern and all the awesome variations and modifications you guys are fantastic
